error-message.email: Input has to be valid email!
error-message.upload-unsuccessful: Upload unsuccessful. The file format is not supported
error-message.password-not-match: Password and confirm password did not match!
error-message.confirm-form-required: New password and retype password are required!
error-message.must-match: New password and retype password did not match!
error-message.incorrect-account: Incorrect email or password, try again with the correct email or password!
error-message.special-character: Password must include at least 1 special character!
error-message.invalid-code: Invalid verification code provided, please try again!
error-message.has-number: Password must include at least 1 number!
error-message.has-uppercase: Password must include at least 1 uppercase!
error-message.has-lowercase: Password must include at least 1 lowercase!
error-message.otp-limit: You've reached the attempt limit. Please try again in an hour.
error-message.match-confirm-text: Please enter the word ‘Confirm’ exactly as shown
error-message.no-space: Spaces are not allowed in this field.

info-message.choose-up-to-3: You can choose up to 3 specializations.
